name: Combat Elite Army 2017
description:
Combat Elite Army 2017 is a special ops mission of evil enemy’s assassination that will let you experience & use battle survival & gun shooting skills in intense & eventful war environment. In this free to play action filled shooting 3D game hold aim, target & hunt as a super stealth army hero kill brutal vice terrorist, gangsters & mafia. This is a war against the terrorist who are hidden in their secret base camp.
Features:
• Variety of modenr weapons & guns
• Challenging 3D First Person Shooting (FPS) gameplay.
• Thrilling & exciting missions.
• Immersive 3D environment
